title: Can spiritual techniques let me time travel? - Quora

response.answer_text: There is no reason to believe so, though you can have very vivid hallucinations which might make you think you were observing another time. Can dreaming let me think I’m being chased through a kitchen goods store by a giant stuffed rabbit? Yes. Did it happen? No.

Yes. But when you reach that level. You will not do it. There are numerous yogi in himalays who can do that. If you want to know more I would recommend you to read Living with Himalayn Master by Swami Ram

you will forget about time travel when you wake up. all time is in this moment. all past, present and future is just now. there is nothing else, there was nothing else and there will be nothing else. just this moment.
